ygData.subject: Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Me and my friend Matt are making a free on-line game like Everquest except not as graphical but it s pretty darn good for a game thats not going to cost you
ygData.messageBody:
Me and my friend Matt are making a free on-line
game like Everquest except not as graphical but it's
pretty darn good for a game thats not going to cost you
anything, anyways we need your help if you could come to
the club below and post in the club what you want and
don't want in this type of game then we will be able to
make the game as pleasing to the player as
possible...Or if you just want to drop by to get some details
about the game your more than welcome too
at...<a href=http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/dragonbladerpg target=new>http://clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/dragonbladerpg</a> <br>Thanks,<br><br>Steve (Game Designer)
